title: Cardano dApp Claim
description: Registration of update of Cardano dApp claim.

subject.description: Identifier of the claim subject (dApp). A UTF-8 encoded string. Typically it is randomly generated hash by the dApp developer.

rootHash.description: blake2b hash of the metadata describing the dApp.

items.description: A valid url pointing to off-chain CIP-72 compatible metadata document.

type.description: Describes the releases, if they are new or an updates. Also states the versioning of such releases.

action.description: Describes the action this certificate is claiming. I.e 'REGISTER', for a new dapp; 'UPDATE' for a new release or 'DE_REGISTER' for dApp version de-listing request and DE_REGISTER_ALL if a dApp developer wants to de-register all dApp versions in one call.

releaseNumber.description: An official version of the release following semver format (major.minor.patch).

signature.description: Signature of the blake2b-256 hash of whole canonical (RFC 8785) JSON document (except signature property).

r.description: A hex representation of the R component of the signature.

s.description: A hex representation of the S component of the signature.

pub.description: A hex representation of the public key.
